short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy access short term notes with TabNotes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension which allows you to quickly take notes and them come back to them later. 

You can close the tab and come back to it at any time, and it will save what ever you had there before closing the tab.
